org.hibernate.search.engine.impl

Class DefaultIndexManagerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.engine.impl.DefaultIndexManagerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexManagerFactory, Service, Startable

    public class DefaultIndexManagerFactory
extends Object
implements IndexManagerFactory, Startable
    This is the default IndexManager implementation for Hibernate Search.
    Author:
    Sanne Grinovero (C) 2012 Red Hat Inc., Hardy Ferentschik

      • aliasToFQN

        protected String aliasToFQN(String alias)
        Provide a way to expand known aliases to fully qualified class names. As opposed to fromAlias(String) we can use this to expand to well known implementations which are optional on the classpath.
        Parameters:
        alias - the alias to replace with the fully qualified class name of the implementation
        Returns:
        the same name, or a fully qualified class name to use instead

      • fromAlias

        protected IndexManager fromAlias(String alias)
        Extension point: allow to override aliases or add new ones to directly create class instances.
        Parameters:
        alias - the requested alias
        Returns:
        return the index manager for the given alias or null if the alias is unknown.
